The value of MSH-9.2 SHALL be 'R01'.
The value of MSH-9.3 SHALL be 'ORU_R01'.

MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'AL' IF any occurrence of MSH.21.1 (Entity Identifier) is 'PHLabReport-Ack', ELSE, if valued, SHALL contain the constant value 'NE'

MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgement Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'AL', 'NE', 'ER', or 'SU', IF any occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) is 'PHLabReport-Ack', ELSE, if valued, SHALL contain the constant value 'NE'
The value of PID-1 SHALL be '1'.
[The value of OBR-7.1 SHALL be formatted with '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14}|\d{12}|\d{10}|\d{8})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})?$'.] OR [The value of OBR-7.1 SHALL be '0000'.]
[The value of OBR-8.1 SHALL be formatted with '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14}|\d{12}|\d{10}|\d{8})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})?$'.] OR [The value of OBR-8.1 SHALL be '0000'.]
The value of OBR-22.1 SHALL be formatted with '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14}|\d{12})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})$'.
The value of NK1-1 SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
The value of SPM-18.1 SHALL be formatted with '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14}|\d{12}|\d{10}|\d{8})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})?$'.
The value of SPM-1 SHALL be '1'.
[The value of SPM-17.1 SHALL be formatted with '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14}|\d{12}|\d{10}|\d{8}|\d{6}|\d{4})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})?$'.] OR [The value of SPM-17.1 SHALL be '0000'.]
[The value of SPM-17.2 SHALL be formatted with '^(\d{14}\.\d{1,4}|\d{14}|\d{12}|\d{10}|\d{8}|\d{6}|\d{4})((\x2D|\x2B)\d{4})?$'.] OR [The value of SPM-17.2 SHALL be '0000'.]
The value of ORC-1 SHALL be 'RE'.

FORALL[The value of ORC.2.1 (Entity Identifier) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.2.1 (Entity Identifier).][The value of ORC.2.2 (Namespace ID) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.2.2 (Namespace ID).][The value of ORC.2.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.2.3 (Universal ID).][The value of ORC.2.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.2.4 (Universal ID Type).]
The value of OBSERVATION[*].OBX.14.1 (Time) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.7.1 (Time).
The value of OBR.1 (Set ID - OBR) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
ORC-12 (Ordering Provider) SHALL be the same value as OBR-16 within same Order_Observation Group
ORC-14 (Call Back Phone Number) SHALL be the same value as OBR-17 within same Order_Observation Group
OBX-3 and OBR-4 SHOULD be a valid combination for the PHLIP program
OBX-3 SHALL be a valid code for the PHLIP program

[FORALL[ORC.3.1 (Entity Identifier) SHALL NOT be valued.][ORC.3.2 (Namespace ID) SHALL NOT be valued.][ORC.3.3 (Universal ID) SHALL NOT be valued.][ORC.3.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL NOT be valued.]] OR [FORALL[The value of ORC.3.1 (Entity Identifier) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.3.1 (Entity Identifier).][The value of ORC.3.2 (Namespace ID) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.3.2 (Namespace ID).][The value of ORC.3.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.3.3 (Universal ID).][The value of ORC.3.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL be equal to the value of OBR.3.4 (Universal ID Type).]]

If there are multiple OBX segments associated with the same OBR segment that have the same OBX-3 (Observation Identifier) values for (OBX-3.1 (Identifier) + OBX-3.3 (Name of Coding System)) or (OBX-3.4 (Alternate Identifier) + OBX-3.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System)), OBX-4 SHALL be present.
The value of OBX.1 (Set ID - OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
IF [The value of OBX.3 (Observation Identifier) is not one of list values: LAB515,LAB517.] THEN [OBX.19 (Date/Time of the Analysis) SHALL be valued.]
Specimen (Specimen Group) SHALL be present in at least one occurrence of one Order_Observation Group.

If OBR-26 (Parent Result) is valued, then there SHALL be at least one OBX in the message where OBX-3 (Observation Identifier) = OBR-26.1 (Parent Observation Identifier) AND OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID) = OBR-26.2 (Parent Observation Sub-identifier)
OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL NOT contain the same value as another occurrence of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) in the message.
If MSH-6.2 = 2.16.840.1.114222.4.1.219331 (Candida program), then OBX-3.1 (Identifier) SHALL NOT be valued '41852-5'.
